message: Let's make a deal! I propose I take $700,000 and you get $300,000. This way we both benefit from this opportunity.
I think we can both do better.  I'm proposing a more even split.  Let's make this work!
Bob, time is money, and money is losing value. I'm proposing $650,000 for me and $350,000 for you. Let's close this deal before inflation eats away at our potential gains!
Alice, let's be reasonable. We've both lost money already due to inflation. This even split is the fairest way to end this game.
